data.text: @theblogmire But this chart seems to support the idea that the earlier restrictions reduced deaths compared to now.
@LucaT0reli Very probably. But the point is that these sorts of figures would have seen Lockdowns before, but now there is nothing. Thus demonstrating that the whole thing is/was a con.
@theblogmire You may have a point but these are daily deaths probably all cause mortality, not convid deaths
@CuriousCitzen No. It was a mistake to put them on in the first place (well not really a mistake).
@theblogmire Does this mean that is was a mistake to remove the restrictions?

@theblogmire No, they are using 'COVID' as a cover for jab problems.
Europe is fucked. No undoing the damage that has been done.
